Title: The Wilson renormalization group for low x physics: Gluon evolution at finite parton density
Authors: Jamal Jalilian-Marian, Alex Kovner, Heribert Weigert
Abstract:
We derive the complete Wilson renormalization group equation which governs the evolution of the gluon distribution and other gluonic observables at low
x
and arbitrary density.
